parameters.__custom_action_script__:
#coding: utf-8
import workflow
import keychain
import console
import sound

# PASSWORDS WILL BE STORED SECURELY IN THE PYTHON KEYCHAIN
# ONCE SAVED IN THE KEYCHAIN, YOU WON'T BE ASKED FOR A PASSWORD AGAIN
# IF YOU PREVIOUSLY SET A PASSWORD FOR A SERVICE, YOU WON'T BE ASKED AGAIN EITHER

# TO DELETE A PREVIOUSLY SET PASSWORD, ACTIVATE THE RESET OPTION IN THE CUSTOM ACTION

params = workflow.get_parameters()
service = params.get('Service')
username = params.get('Username')
reset = params.get('Reset Password')
sound.load_effect('Error')
sound.load_effect('Jump')

if not username:
	sound.play_effect('Error')
	console.alert('Authentication Needed', 'A username is required to log into the service. Add one in the action parameters of the workflow editor.')
	workflow.stop()
if not service:
	sound.play_effect('Error')
	console.alert('Authentication Needed', 'A service name is required. Add one in the action parameters of the workflow editor.')
	workflow.stop()

if reset:
	keychain.delete_password(service, username)
	sound.play_effect('Jump')
	console.hud_alert('Password Deleted')

password = keychain.get_password(service, username)
if not password:
	password = console.password_alert('Add New Password To Keychain', 'Add a new password for ' + service + ' (' + username + ').')
	if password:
		keychain.set_password(service, username, password)
	else:
		workflow.stop()

workflow.set_variable('username', username)
workflow.set_variable('password', password)

parameters.__custom_action_script__:
import xmlrpclib
import workflow
import keychain
import console

categories = workflow.get_variable("cats")
params = workflow.get_parameters()
 
wp_url = params.get('xmlrpc.php URL')
wp_username = params.get('Username')
wp_password = params.get('Password')
wp_blogid = ""

console.show_activity('Fetching categories...')
 
server = xmlrpclib.ServerProxy(wp_url)
 
cat = server.wp.getTerms(wp_blogid, wp_username, wp_password, 'category')

for x in cat:
	categories += '\n' + x['name']
	workflow.set_variable("cats", categories)
console.hide_activity()

parameters.__custom_action_script__:
import xmlrpclib
import workflow
import keychain
import console

tags = workflow.get_variable("thetags")
params = workflow.get_parameters()
 
wp_url = params.get('xmlrpc.php URL')
wp_username = params.get('Username')
wp_password = params.get('Password')
wp_blogid = ""

console.show_activity('Fetching tags...')
 
server = xmlrpclib.ServerProxy(wp_url)
 
tag = server.wp.getTerms(wp_blogid, wp_username, wp_password, 'post_tag')

for x in tag:
	tags += '\n' + x['name']
	workflow.set_variable("thetags", tags)
console.hide_activity()

parameters.__custom_action_script__:
import xmlrpclib
import workflow
import clipboard
import console
import keychain
import sound

params = workflow.get_parameters()
sound.load_effect('Woosh_1')
 
wp_url = params.get('xmlrpc.php URL')
wp_username = params.get('Username')
wp_password = params.get('Password')
wp_blogid = ""

console.show_activity('Opening connection...')

server = xmlrpclib.ServerProxy(wp_url)
 
title = workflow.get_variable('postname')
content = workflow.get_variable('content')
cat_nb = workflow.get_variable("catID")
tags_nb = workflow.get_variable("tagID")

tagnew = tags_nb.split('\n')
 
tags = []
for x in tagnew:
	tags.append(x)
	
catnew = cat_nb.split('\n')
 
categories = []
for x in catnew:
	categories.append(x)

linkcheck = workflow.get_variable('linkedurl')

if linkcheck is not None:
	data = {'title': title, 'description': content, 'post_type': 'post', 'categories': categories, 'mt_keywords': tags, 'custom_fields': [{'value': linkcheck, 'key': 'externalLink'}]}
elif linkcheck is None:
	data = {'title': title, 'description': content, 'post_type': 'post', 'categories': categories, 'mt_keywords': tags}

console.show_activity('Publishing...')
 
post_id = server.metaWeblog.newPost(wp_blogid, wp_username, wp_password, data, True)
 
# post_infos = server.metaWeblog.getPost(post_id, wp_username, wp_password)
# print post_infos['link']
# clipboard.set(post_infos['link'])

console.hud_alert('Post published', 'Success', 1.0)
sound.play_effect('Woosh_1')
workflow.set_output('Success')
